entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Bachelors Island
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 early this evening then west 50 gusting to 70 late this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 early in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
